ModMetaData.name: Ritual Outcome Selection 选择仪式结果
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
[h1] Ritual Outcome Selection 选择仪式结果 [/h1]
[h2] Description [/h2] This mod allows you to select the outcome of a ritual in RimWorld.
The motivation of this mod is to save some time for myself doing Save and Load to get the desired outcome of a ritual.
[h2] Usage [/h2] Just start a ritual as usual, a new dialog will pop up before the ritual starts, allowing you to select your expected outcome of the ritual.
[h2] 描述 [/h2] 这个mod允许你在RimWorld中选择仪式的结果。
这个mod的目的是为了节省自己S/L的时间，以获得想要的仪式结果。
[h2] 使用 [/h2] 按常规方式开始一个仪式，仪式开始前会弹出一个对话框，让你选择你想要的仪式结果。
